stanza.line: When to the sessions of sweet silent thoughtthought
I summon up remembrance of things pastpast
I sigh the lack of many a thing I soughtsought
And with old woes new wail my dear time wastewaste
Then can I drown an eye (unused to flow)flow)
For precious friends hid in death dateless nightnight
And weep afresh love long since cancelled woewoe
And moan th expense of many a vanished sightsight
Then can I grieve at grievances foregoneforegone
And heavily from woe to woe tell oeroer
The sad account of fore-bemoaned moanmoan
Which I new pay as if not paid beforebefore
But if the while I think on thee (dear friend)friend)
All losses are restored and sorrows endend
